meta.title: New York French American Charter SchoolNew York French American Charter School

meta.content: New York French American Charter School
New York French American Charter SchoolNew York French American Charter School

New York French American Charter School is a free public French immersion school located in Harlem. With over 50 nationalities represented and the French curriculum being taught in parallel with the American curriculum, students are where prepared to understand the multicultural diversity of the wor

New York French American Charter School is a free public French immersion school located in Harlem. With over 50 nationalities represented and the French curriculum being taught in parallel with the American curriculum, students are where prepared to understand the multicultural diversity of the wor

meta.content: New York French American Charter School is a free public French immersion school located in Harlem. With over 50 nationalities represented and the French curriculum being taught in parallel with the American curriculum, students are where prepared to understand the multicultural diversity of the wor

meta.name: description
meta.content: New York French American Charter School is a free public French immersion school located in Harlem. With over 50 nationalities represented and the French curriculum being taught in parallel with the American curriculum, students are where prepared to understand the multicultural diversity of the world they will be facing in the future.

h1.strong: NEW YORK FRENCH AMERICAN CHARTER SCHOOL RECEIVES 5 YEAR CHARTER RENEWAL - THE MAXIMUM ALLOWABLE.

a.strong: WE CELEBRATE THE WHOLE NYFACS COMMUNITY

figure.class: sqs-block-image-figure image-block-outer-wrapper image-block-v2 design-layout-card combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none image-position-left image-linked

div.data-description:
Thank you for your interest in our School.

The New York French American Charter School is currently accepting Pre-K - 7th grade applications for the 2019 - 2020 school year. We're required by New York State Law to have a lottery-based admissions process. Our lottery ensures that applicants are selected at random. Students not accepted in the lottery will be placed on our waiting list for spaces that may become available in the future.

Click here to apply today!

img.alt: Thank You For Your Interest - The New York French American Charter School is currently accepting Pre-K - 7th grade applications for the 2019 - 2020 school year. We're required by New York State Law to have a lottery-based admissions process. Our lottery ensures that applicants are selected at random. Students not accepted in the lottery will be placed on our waiting list for spaces that may become available in the future.Click here to apply today!

div.p: The New York French American Charter School is currently accepting Pre-K - 7th grade applications for the 2019 - 2020 school year. We're required by New York State Law to have a lottery-based admissions process. Our lottery ensures that applicants are selected at random. Students not accepted in the lottery will be placed on our waiting list for spaces that may become available in the future.

figure.class: sqs-block-image-figure image-block-outer-wrapper image-block-v2 design-layout-card combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none image-position-left

a.data-description: It takes just a few minutes to apply and only one application, either paper or online, needs to be completed for all children (pre-k to high school) living in your household. Click here to complete your online application today!

img.alt: School Food Application - It takes just a few minutes to apply. Complete one application per household. Click here to complete your online application today!

div.p: It takes just a few minutes to apply. Complete one application per household. Click here to complete your online application today!
